application.doc: Retrieving the current list of ldap object classes from the configured ldap connection

param.name: attrs_dir
param.doc: The federated directory to use for the ldap object classes and ldap attributes. This parameter is optional. If not specified then the stored configuration will be used.

param.name: ldap_connection
param.doc: The type of the ldap server connection. This parameter is optional. If not specified then the stored configuration will be used.

param.name: ldap_connection
param.doc: The name of the ldap server connection. This parameter is optional. If not specified then the stored configuration will be used.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the ldap objectclasses scim configuration resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: ldapObjectClassesListJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the LDAP objectclass.
